thread.title: Governor, Sen. Reed call for renewed push towards gun control
thread.title_full: Governor, Sen. Reed call for renewed push towards gun control - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Governor, Sen. Reed call for renewed push towards gun control
text: PROVIDENCE, R.I. -- Fewer than 12 hours after the second on-campus shooting in a week, and on the heels of a spate of mass shootings across the country, U.S. Senator Jack Reed and Governor Gina Raimondo called for renewed legislative efforts to prevent gun control. Joining them at a news conference were Teny Gross, on his final day as executive director of the Institute for the Study and Practice of Nonviolence, State Police Col. Stephen G. O'Donnell, Jerry Belair, president of [...]> ...
